g1_etcd.title: @etcd Operator Implementation
g1_etcd.description: Implement production-ready etcd distributed key-value store operator with cluster management, leader election, and consensus operations

g2_elasticsearch.title: @elasticsearch Operator Implementation
g2_elasticsearch.description: Implement Elasticsearch search and analytics operator with index management, search queries, and cluster operations

g3_consul.title: @consul Operator Implementation
g3_consul.description: Implement HashiCorp Consul service discovery operator with service registration, health checks, and KV store

g4_vault.title: @vault Operator Implementation
g4_vault.description: Implement HashiCorp Vault secrets management operator with secret storage, encryption, and policy management

notes: Agent A1 focuses on critical infrastructure operators that form the backbone of distributed systems.
